page.title: 20LOCAL HISTORY_MRS DARK 2
page.content: {Mrs Dark}went to school at{Probus}and she thinks that the main thing they were fussy about while she was there was handwriting .Mrs Dark thinks that{discipline}was harder when she was young.She got a rap across the knuckles with a ruler if she was bad.Mrs Dark played netball at school. Mrs Dark doesnt think games have changed much over the years .When Mrs Dark went to school they had desks with{inkwells.} {The Police Station}was at{Rose Cottage {but it moved to}Trevolgus.There is a room in Rose Cottage that was used as a jail and the policemen lived upstairs.There is a room where criminals would meet their relations. {Mrs Darks clothes}changed with fashion but she couldn't wear jeans because there was no blue denim.
